definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)

sentences.english: But they leading him by the hands, brought him to Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 人们牵著他的手，领他进了大马士革。

sentences.english: Eyes are now turning on Damascus and Aleppo.
sentences.chinese: 视线正在向大马士革和阿勒波转移。

sentences.english: Our reporter says fighting is continuing in Demara and that the atmosphere in Bangui is very tense.
sentences.chinese: 记者称大马士革的战斗仍在继续，班基的气氛很紧张。

sentences.english: Heaven ancient capital, Damascus, mysterious and old.
sentences.chinese: 天国古都，大马士革，神秘又古老。

sentences.english: We had one last trip to make, a day excursion from Damascus by car - just.
sentences.chinese: 最后的游程是从大马士革乘汽车出发作一天的远足。

sentences.english: You don'teven need a car in Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 在大马士革游览甚至都不需要坐车。

sentences.english: Al-Mabhouh has lived in exile in Damascus for years.
sentences.chinese: 马巴胡赫在大马士革流亡多年。

sentences.english: He knew what God had done with him on that road to Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 他知道神在他回大马士革的路上和他说了什么。

sentences.english: Why is damask so unique then?
sentences.chinese: 为什么大马士革刀如此独特？

sentences.english: And I will kindle a fire in the wall of Damascus, and it shall consume the palaces of Benhadad.
sentences.chinese: 我必在大马士革城中使火着起，烧灭便哈达的宫殿。

sentences.english: This would approach the opinion of the Damascene concerning the holiness of the active conception.
sentences.chinese: 这将接近舆论对大马士革关于成圣的积极构想。

sentences.english: He wrote a lot of reports of the war in the Middle East during his stay in Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 他在大马士革期间写了很多报道中东战争的通讯。

sentences.english: He says the conflict in Syria will likely move increasingly to Damascus.
sentences.chinese: 哈林表示，叙利亚冲突可能会越来越转向大马士革。

sentences.english: Behold, Damascus is taken away from being a city, and it shall be a ruinous heap.
sentences.chinese: 看哪，大马士革已被废弃，不再为城，必变作乱堆。

sentences.english: That was the chant from the mourners at a funeral in a Damascus suburb today.
sentences.chinese: 这是今天来自大马士革郊区一个葬礼上悼念者的口号。

definition: Tabriz city in northwest Iran, capital of Iranian East Azerbaijan
Gaza/same as 加沙地帶|加沙地带[Jia1 sha1 di4 dai4], the Gaza strip
